title: sa_kātyāyanasmṛti
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
      <div>
	<head>Kātyāyanasmṛtisāroddhāraḥ</head>

	<pb edRef='Kane1933' n='1'/>
	<note type='subheading'>[rāja-guṇāḥ]</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_001'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinītaḥ śāstrasaṃpannaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kośaśauryasamanvitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmaṇyo dānaśīlaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satyadharmaparo nṛpaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_001'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vinītaḥ śāstra-saṃpannaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kośa-śaurya-samanvitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brahmaṇyo dāna-śīlaḥ syāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>satya-dharma-paro nṛpaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_002'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>stambhopatāpapaiśunya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāpalakrodhavarjitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbhaḥ sannatodagraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāṣī priyadarśanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_002'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>stambha-upatāpa-paiśunya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>cāpala-krodha-varjitaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pragalbhaḥ sannata-udagraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saṃbhāṣī priyadarśanaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_003'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaśyendriyaṃ jitātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛtadaṇḍaṃ vikāriṣu</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣyakāriṇaṃ dhīram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyantaṃ śrīr niṣevate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_003'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vaśya-indriyaṃ jita-ātmānaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dhṛta-daṇḍaṃ vikāriṣu</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>parīkṣya-kāriṇaṃ dhīram</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>atyantaṃ śrīr niṣevate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<note type='subheading'>[rāja-dharmāḥ]</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_004'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śauryavidyārthabāhulyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhutvāc ca viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadā cittaṃ narendrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>moham āyāti kāraṇāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_004'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śaurya-vidyā-artha-bāhulyāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhutvāc ca viśeṣataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadā cittaṃ narendrāṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>moham āyāti kāraṇāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_005'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāc cittaṃ praboddhavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājadharme sadā dvijaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pavitraṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smṛtivākyaṃ na laṅghayet</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_005'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmāc cittaṃ praboddhavyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rāja-dharme sadā dvijaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pavitraṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>smṛti-vākyaṃ na laṅghayet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_006'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vedadhvaniprabhāveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devāḥ svarganivāsinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te 'pi tatra pramodante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptās tu dvijapūjanāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_006'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>veda-dhvani-prabhāveṇa</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>devāḥ svarga-nivāsinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>te 'pi tatra pramodante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tṛptās tu dvija-pūjanāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_007'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād yatnena kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvijapūjā sadā nṛpaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena bhūyo 'pi śakratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narendratvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_007'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tasmād yatnena kartavyā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvija-pūjā sadā nṛpaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tena bhūyo 'pi śakratvaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>narendratvaṃ punaḥ punaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_008'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>surādhyakṣaś cyutaḥ svargān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛparūpeṇa tiṣṭhati</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartavyaṃ tena tan nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena tattvaṃ samāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_008'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sura-adhyakṣaś cyutaḥ svargān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpa-rūpeṇa tiṣṭhati</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kartavyaṃ tena tan nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yena tattvaṃ samāpnuyāt</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_009'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmīye saṃsthitā dharme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāḥ śakratvam āpnuyuḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avīcivāsino ye tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyapetācāriṇaḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_009'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ātmīye saṃsthitā dharme</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nṛpāḥ śakratvam āpnuyuḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avīci-vāsino ye tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vyapeta-ācāriṇaḥ sadā</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_010'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchet samyagavijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaśaṃ krodhasya yo nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaset sa narakaṃ<note>narake?</note> ghore</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpārdhaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_010'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gacchet samyag-avijñāya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaśaṃ krodhasya yo nṛpaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vaset sa narakaṃ<note>narake?</note> ghore</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kalpa-ardhaṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='Kane1933' n='2'/>
	<lg xml:id='Kāty_011'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etair eva guṇair yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amātyaṃ kāryacintakam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇaṃ tu prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpabhaktaṃ kulodvaham</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_011'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>etair eva guṇair yuktam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amātyaṃ kārya-cintakam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>brāhmaṇaṃ tu prakurvīta</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nṛpa-bhaktaṃ kula-udvaham</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_012'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriṇo yatra sabhyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyāś ca priyavādinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājyād dharmāt sukhāt tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipraṃ hīyeta pārthivaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_012'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mantriṇo yatra sabhyāś ca</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaidyāś ca priya-vādinaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rājyād dharmāt sukhāt tatra</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kṣipraṃ hīyeta pārthivaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_013'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tasya vacane kopam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eteṣāṃ tu pravartayet</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād etaiḥ sadā vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāyyaṃ supariniṣṭhitam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_013'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>na tasya vacane kopam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>eteṣāṃ tu pravartayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yasmād etaiḥ sadā vācyaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nyāyyaṃ supariniṣṭhitam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_014'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra karmāṇi nṛpatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ paśyati dharmataḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra sādhusamācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivaseyuḥ sukhaṃ prajāḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_014'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yatra karmāṇi nṛpatiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svayaṃ paśyati dharmataḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatra sādhu-samācārā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nivaseyuḥ sukhaṃ prajāḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_015'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṇṭakānāṃ ca śodhanam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvijānāṃ pūjanaṃ caiva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad arthaṃ kṛto nṛpaḥ</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_015'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṇṭakānāṃ ca śodhanam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dvijānāṃ pūjanaṃ ca eva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>etad arthaṃ kṛto nṛpaḥ</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_016'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūsvāmī tu smṛto rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nānyadravyasya sarvadā</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatphalasya hi ṣaḍbhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnuyān nānyathaiva tu</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_016'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhū-svāmī tu smṛto rājā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na anya-dravyasya sarvadā</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat-phalasya hi ṣaḍ-bhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prāpnuyān na anyatha aiva tu</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_017'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtānāṃ tannivāsitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmitvaṃ tena kīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tatkriyā baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śubhāśubhanimittajam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_017'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhūtānāṃ tan-nivāsitvāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>svāmitvaṃ tena kīrtitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat-kriyā bali-ṣaḍ-bhāgaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śubha-aśubha-nimitta-jam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_018'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pravartate yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lobhaṃ tyaktvā narādhipaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya putrāḥ prajāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāṣṭraṃ kośaś ca vardhate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_018'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>evaṃ pravartate yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lobhaṃ tyaktvā nara-adhipaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tasya putrāḥ prajāyante</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rāṣṭraṃ kośaś ca vardhate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_019'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyāyena hi yo rāṣṭrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca pārthivaḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sasyabhāgaṃ ca śulkaṃ cāpy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādadīta sa pāpabhāk</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_019'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>anyāyena hi yo rāṣṭrāt</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca pārthivaḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sasya-bhāgaṃ ca śulkaṃ ca apy</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>ādadīta sa pāpa-bhāk</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_020'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arthaśāstroktam utsṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharmaśāstroktam āvrajet</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_020'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>artha-śāstra-uktam utsṛjya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dharma-śāstra-uktam āvrajet</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_021'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duṣṭasyāpi narendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tadrāṣṭraṃ na vināśayet</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na prajānumato yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyāyeṣu pravartate</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_021'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>duṣṭasya api narendrasya</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tad-rāṣṭraṃ na vināśayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na prajā-anumato yasmād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>anyāyeṣu pravartate</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_022'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akleśenārthine yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā samyaṅ nivedayet</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tārayaty anantaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharmārthaṃ dānam īdṛśam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_022'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>akleśena arthine yas tu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rājā samyaṅ nivedayet</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tat tārayaty anantaṃ syād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dharma-arthaṃ dānam īdṛśam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_023'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyāyenākramya yallabdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ripuṃ nirjitya pārthivaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac chuddhaṃ tatpradeyaṃ tan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nānyathopahṛtaṃ kvacit</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_023'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nyāyena akramya yal-labdhaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ripuṃ nirjitya pārthivaiḥ</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tac chuddhaṃ tat-pradeyaṃ tan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na anyatha ūpahṛtaṃ kvacit</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<pb edRef='Kane1933' n='3'/>
	<lg xml:id='Kāty_024'>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā purohitaṃ kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uditaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hitam</seg> /</l>
	  <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛtādhyayanasaṃpannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alubdhaṃ satyavādinam</seg> //</l>
	</lg>
	<note type='analysis' corresp='#Kāty_024'>
	  <lg>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>rājā purohitaṃ kuryād</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>uditaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hitam</seg> /</l>
	    <l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kṛta-adhyayana-saṃpannam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>alubdhaṃ satya-vādinam</seg> //</l>
	  </lg>
	</note>

	<note type='subheading'>[vyavahāra-lakṣaṇādi]</note>

	<lg xml:id='Kāty_025'>
